themes: Bridging the gap between emerging and established creatives
key_phrases: Scaled opportunities to cover the gap between emerging and established creatives/organizations
grants that scale as the organization and impact grows to build capacity
barriers_identified: Gap between emerging and established creatives/organizations
solutions_proposed: Create scaled opportunities for mid-level creatives/organizations

Offer grants that scale as the organization and impact grows
